message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000.  I know it's a valuable piece and I believe this price reflects its worth. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $950,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $950,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,050,000. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
